properties.description: Everyone from the community is welcome. A great way to meet other people and mix across the generations. Drop in any time during the day. Parents and children welcome after school Tea, coffee and toast available all the time. Soup lunch Wednesday 12-1.30pm Oasis Wellbeing Group Tuesday 10.30am-12.30pm CambusBairns parent and toddlers Wednesday 9.15-10.30am Prayer Space available upstairs
properties.title: Cambusbarron Community Hub Warm Space provided by Cambusbarron The Bruce Memorial Church

properties.description: Open from 10/12/2022. We offer warm and safe space for woman and child, art activities for little ones, free mental health and psychological support for mum. Tea/ coffee/ homemade bowl of soup. We offer free art and craft activities and psychological support
